titles.title: A bill to amend title XVI of the Social Security Act to eliminate the one-third benefit reduction presently applicable to individuals receiving support and maintenance in kind from families with whom they are living.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to Subcommittee on Public Assistance and Unemployment Compensation.

bill.summary: 7/15/1987--Introduced. Amends title XVI (Supplemental Security Income) (SSI) of the Social Security Act to eliminate the one-third SSI benefit reduction applicable to individuals receiving support and maintenance in kind from families with whom they reside.
